title: Livestock Farmer Field School teaches good practices to reduce antimicrobial resistance

tasks.task: Farmers participating in a project to reduce antimicrobial resistance in poultry production in Kenya through improved hygiene and vaccination.
subtasks: Conducting knowledge, attitude, and practices study among farmers.
Identifying diseases preventable through vaccination and hygiene.
Training farmers using the farmer field school approach.
Teaching farmers about proper feeding and antibiotic-free egg production.
Observing and evaluating the implementation of best practices by farmers.
Witnessing improvements in egg quality and reduced drug use by trained farmers.
Reconstructing poultry units to incorporate learned biosecurity measures.
Graduating trained farmers in a ceremony recognizing their achievements.
